mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t. CODE, t. NAME, t.start_user_name startUserName, t.start_date startDate, fl. CODE flCode, t.business_id businessId, CASE t. STATUS WHEN '1' THEN '运行中' WHEN '2' THEN '正常完成' WHEN '3' THEN '撤回' WHEN '4' THEN '打回' WHEN '7' THEN '作废' WHEN '9' THEN '挂起' ELSE '其他' END STATUS FROM pt_flow_instance t, pt_flow_fl fl WHERE t.delflag = 0 AND t.`status` != '3' AND t.`status` != '7' AND t.fl_id = fl.id AND ( t. CODE LIKE concat( '%', #{keyword},'%') or t.name LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%') ) AND t.id IN ( SELECT s.instance_id FROM pt_flow_instance_operate_log s WHERE s.operate_type IN ( 'MY_START', 'HAVE_DONE', 'PASS_READ', 'TO_READ', 'HAVE_READ' ) AND s.operator_ids = #{userId} ) ORDER BY t.start_date DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{limit}

SELECT count(t.id) FROM pt_flow_instance t, pt_flow_fl fl WHERE t.delflag=0 and t.fl_id=fl.id AND (t.code LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or t.name LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%') ) AND t.id in ( select s.instance_id from pt_flow_instance_operate_log s WHERE s.operate_type in ('MY_START','HAVE_DONE','PASS_READ','TO_READ','HAVE_READ') AND s.operator_ids = #{userId} )
